content: page 8 island magic handmade chain 3 slip_stitch into the 3rd chain of the chain 3 from the beginning cut your yarn and fasten_off 9 island magic handmade row 5 join color a into any of the chain 3 spaces by crocheting a single_crochet add 2 more single_crochet into the same chain 3 space 1 single_crochet on top of the tulip petal and 3 single_crochet into the next chain 3 space repeat this around until you have reached the last chain 3 space 1 single_crochet on top of the last tulip petal slip_stitch to the first st of the row 10 island magic handmade row 6 continuing with the same color chain 1 1 single_crochet into the first at and the next 2 st into the 4th st crochet single_crochet with picot* *picot - chain 3 then slip_stitch into the two front legs of the single_crochet next crochet 1 single_crochet into the next 3 st again and single_crochet with picot into the 4th st repeat this all the way around the last st of the row should be on top of the last flower petal - place single_crochet with picot into that st then slip_stitch to the first st of the row cut your yarn and fasten_off 11 island magic handmade weave in all your yarn ends the tulip scrunchie is now complete 12 island magic handmade 13 w f t h e r o a m a ls o a n h n y a k i v o e f y o h o p e a b a o u r u n o y d n f o u a n a lin e o e f s n r t r j o o o m r y e p u e d t h e s w c e r r t b o u s c h c h e lip a it e a s i t in g c c e s s e t s y t o r n h r a is ie v g t c u t s s e t e r ly h e y s o i c u r s u c n a p c n h a ie g e t t t t h e e r p a n t t e r n
